T02D3450:107a-1: mug te ke na aa ra pa tsa na s'a dha nam /
T02D3450:107a-3: tshig lhug pa'i aa ra pa tsa na'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3450:107a-5: dang po re zhig sngags pas yid dang mthun pa'i
T02D3450:107a-6: phyogs 'ga' zhig tu stan bde ba la nye bar
T02D3450:107a-7: 'dug ste / rang gi snying gar yi ge dang
T02D3450:107a-8: po las byung ba'i zla ba la lnga pa'i bzhi
T02D3450:107a-9: pa'i sa bon la a'a yig dang mthar thig le
T02D3450:107a-10: gnyis dang ldan pa rnam par bsgoms la /
T02D3450:107a-11: de nas de'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis snying la
T02D3450:107a-12: gnas pa'i nyon mongs pa'i mun pa bsal nas byams
T02D3450:107a-15: btang snyoms zhes pa tshad med pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3450:107a-16: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas byams pa gang zhe na /
T02D3450:107a-17: sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa ltar rab tu dga' ba'o //
T02D3450:107a-19: sdug bsngal gsum gyis gdungs pa'i sems can rnams 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las gdon par 'dod pa'o //
T02D3450:107a-21: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pas gzhan gyi dbang phyug
T02D3450:107a-22: la sogs pa rnams la longs spyod pa la sems
T02D3450:107a-23: dga' ba'o // btang snyoms gang zhe na /
T02D3450:107a-24: rnam pa thams cad du khong khro ba dang /
T02D3450:107b-0: rjes su chags pa dang @107b bral zhing gzhan la
T02D3450:107b-1: phan pa'i chos nyid rang gi ngang gis 'bab cing
T02D3450:107b-2: rab tu 'jug pa'o zhes pa'i tshad med pa'i gnas
T02D3450:107b-3: bzhi bsgoms nas / de'i rjes su rang gi snying
T02D3450:107b-4: ga'i sa bon nyid las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis
T02D3450:107b-5: nam mkha'i phyogs mtha' dag khyab pa'i bla ma dang
T02D3450:107b-6: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams spro ba
T02D3450:107b-7: dang bsdu bas gzhan 'gro ba rnams kyi don gyi
T02D3450:107b-8: bya ba gcig tu byed par bltas las /
T02D3450:107b-9: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis
T02D3450:107b-10: de bzhin du lha'i dri bzangs dang me tog la
T02D3450:107b-11: sogs pa khyad par 'phags pa byung ste /
T02D3450:107b-12: mandal sngon du 'gro bas thal mo sbyar te /
T02D3450:107b-13: bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D3450:107b-14: rnams kyi zhabs kyi chu skyes la spyi bos btud
T02D3450:107b-16: 'od zer de nyid las byung ba'i me tog dang /
T02D3450:107b-24: ba dan la sogs pa rnams kyis de rnams la
T02D3450:107b-25: phyi dang nang gi mchod pa rnams kyis mchod pa
T02D3450:107b-26: ni mchod pa'o // de nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D3450:107b-27: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug las gyur pa'i //
T02D3450:107b-28: lus dang ngag dang gzhan yang yid kyis kyang //
T02D3450:107b-29: sdig pa bgyis dang de bzhin bgyid stsal rnams //
T02D3450:107b-30: thams cad rgyal ba rnams kyi mdun du bshags //
T02D3450:107b-31: zhes pa ni sdig pa bshags pa'o//
T02D3450:107b-32: gang yang de bzhin gshegs kun bsod nams dang //
T02D3450:107b-33: gzhan yang rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam bsten dang //
T02D3450:107b-34: rang sangs rgyas dang bla ma mchog rnams kyi //
T02D3450:107b-35: dge ba kun la bdag ni rjes yi rang //
T02D3450:107b-36: zhes pa ni bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba'o //
T02D3450:107b-37: dus gsum kun du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang //
T02D3450:107b-38: nam mkha'i phyogs khyab brtse ldan yon tan tshogs //
T02D3450:107b-39: skyon spangs 'phags pa'i tshogs dang dam pa'i chos //
T02D3450:107b-40: gus pas bdag ni skyabs su nye bar mchi //
T02D3450:107b-41: zhes pa ni gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'o //
T02D3450:107b-42: yongs su dag pa rgyal ba'i lam bsten pa //
T02D3450:107b-43: tshangs dbang drag po sogs pas rnyed dka' ba ;
T02D3450:107b-44: / gang 'dir bsod nams tshogs ni nyer bsags pa //
T02D3450:107b-45: byang chub sems 'di rab tu bskyed par bgyi //
T02D3450:107b-46: zhes pa ni rgyal ba'i lam la bsten pa dang /
T02D3450:107b-47: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i tshig go //
T02D3450:107b-48: de bzhin du bla na med pa'i mchod pa rnam pa bdun gyis mchod nas /
T02D3450:108a-0: de'i rjes su bla ma'i gsung @108a * //
T02D3450:108a-1: gis phyi dang nang du bcas pa thams cad stong
T02D3450:108a-2: pa nyid du bsgoms nas yang brtan par bya ba'i
T02D3450:108a-3: phyir / aom sva bh'a ba shuddha:sarba dharm'a:svabh'a ba shuddho& ham /
T02D3450:108a-4: zhes pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod par bya'o //
T02D3450:108a-5: de'i rjes su rang gi sems kyi snang ba tsam
T02D3450:108a-6: dang sa shing thogs pa med pa'i gzugs dbyangs yig
T02D3450:108a-7: dang po las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D3450:108a-9: de'i steng du sngon du gsungs pa'i sa bon /
T02D3450:108a-10: de nas zla ba dang sa bon yongs su gyur pa las ral gri 'od 'phro ba'i gzugs so //
T02D3450:108a-11: de nas tshangs pa'i dbus su ri bong 'dzin pa'i steng du sngon du gsungs pa'i sa bon dang /
T02D3450:108a-12: ral gri yongs su gyur pa las 'jam dpal dbyangs
T02D3450:108a-13: ston ka'i zla ba dang mtshungs pa'i 'od phyogs bcu'i
T02D3450:108a-14: 'jig rten gsal bar byed pa'i 'od kyi tshogs 'chang
T02D3450:108a-15: ba / phyag gnyis pa gzhon nu'i rnam pa can /
T02D3450:108a-16: phyag g-yas pa na mi shes pa ma lus pa
T02D3450:108a-17: gcig tu gcod par byed pa'i ral gri bsnams pa
T02D3450:108a-18: / g-yon na thabs su gyur pa ma lus pa'i bstan bcos kyi po ti phyag na bsnams pa /
T02D3450:108a-19: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3450:108a-20: na bza' dmar po mnabs pa /
T02D3450:108a-21: bsam gtan la rtse gcig tu gnas pa /
T02D3450:108a-22: padma rab tu rgyas pa'i zhal mnga' ba /
T02D3450:108a-24: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis spras pa /
T02D3450:108a-25: aindra n'i la'i nor bu lta bu'i dbu skra'i tshogs zur phud lnga dang ldan pa /
T02D3450:108a-26: chu skyes dkar po 'dab ma brgyad pa dang zla
T02D3450:108a-27: ba la rdo rje skyil krung gis nye bar bzhugs
T02D3450:108a-28: pa / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye
T02D3450:108a-29: shes kyi ngo bo nyid 'jam dpal gyi skur bdag
T02D3450:108a-30: pa / nyid bsgoms la / de ltar rnal 'byor
T02D3450:108a-31: pa dam tshig sems dpa'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas
T02D3450:108a-32: rang gi snying gar aa yig las skyes pa'i 'khor
T02D3450:108a-34: 'od zer gyi tshogs 'phro bas mi shes pa ma
T02D3450:108a-35: lus pa 'joms par byed pa myur du g-yas su
T02D3450:108a-36: 'khor bar byed pa'i rim pa bltas la /
T02D3450:108a-37: de'i steng du bar snang la dbyangs yig dang po las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D3450:108a-38: de'i steng du yi ge lnga rim pa ji lta
T02D3450:108a-39: ba bzhin du mar me 'bar ba'i rnam pa lta
T02D3450:108a-40: bus 'od zer dang bcas pas mi shes pa mtha'
T02D3450:108a-41: dag gcod par byed pa bla ma'i man ngag gis
T02D3450:108a-42: bsgom par bya'o // lha'i rnam pa rdzogs pa las
T02D3450:108a-43: sngags pas le lo med par spro ba la sogs
T02D3450:108a-44: pa byas nas bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D3450:108a-45: yang na snying ga'i zla ba'i dbus su aa yig
T02D3450:108b-0: dkar po'i rnam pa @108b rdzogs pa las aa ra
T02D3450:108b-1: pa tsa na zhes pa dkar po rgyan thams cad
T02D3450:108b-2: kyis brgyan pa / dga' ba'i bsam gtan la rtse gcig tu gnas pa /
T02D3450:108b-3: rdo rje skyil mo krung gis nye bar bzhugs pa /
T02D3450:108b-4: phyag g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag gis ral gri dang po ti bsnams pa /
T02D3450:108b-5: aindra n'i la lta bu'i ral pa'i lcang lo lnga dang ldan pa /
T02D3450:108b-6: 'od 'phro ba'i zla ba'i zhal zla blta bus smra ba'i mchog go //
T02D3450:108b-7: zla ba la rang gi sa bon dang bcas pa snying gar bsgoms la /
T02D3450:108b-8: de'i mdun du ra yig dkar po las byung ba'i
T02D3450:108b-9: dra ba can gyi 'od rang gi sa bon gnas
T02D3450:108b-10: par blta'o // de'i rjes su rgyab tu pa yig
T02D3450:108b-11: dkar po las byung ba'i zla 'od rang gi snying
T02D3450:108b-12: ga'i zla ba la sa bon dang ldan par blta'o
T02D3450:108b-13: par blta'o // // de nas g-yas su tsa yig
T02D3450:108b-14: dkar po las byung ba'i skra can ma dkar mo
T02D3450:108b-15: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3450:108b-16: nu ma rgyas pa rang gi snying ga'i sa bon dang ldan pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3450:108b-17: de nas g-yon du na yig dkar po las byung
T02D3450:108b-18: ba'i nye ba'i skra can ma rang gi snying ga'i
T02D3450:108b-19: zla ba las sa bon dang ldan par bsgom par
T02D3450:108b-20: bya'o // thams cad aa ra pa tsa na dang 'dra bar rnam par bsam par bya'o //
T02D3450:108b-21: lha'i tshogs 'di rnams snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od
T02D3450:108b-22: zer las spro ba dang bsdu bas 'gro ba rnams
T02D3450:108b-23: kyi mi shes pa'i tshogs gcod cing chos kyi bdud
T02D3450:108b-24: rtsi dang / bstan bcos mtha' dag dang /
T02D3450:108b-25: bzo'i tshogs rnams kyis sems can thams cad yang dang yang du yang dag par tshim par mdzad pa /
T02D3450:108b-26: dri ma med cing thogs pa med pa'i rang bzhin du bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3450:108b-27: bla ma'i man ngag gis ting nge 'dzin dang sngags bzlas par bya ste /
T02D3450:108b-28: aom yig dang por byas la sa bon gyi yi
T02D3450:108b-29: ge lnga po dbus su byas nas dam tshig sems
T02D3450:108b-30: dpa'i sa bon gyi mthar sngags so //
T02D3450:108b-31: gang gi tshe ldang bar 'dod pa de'i tshe rang
T02D3450:108b-32: gi sngags bla ma'i man ngag gis bzlas par bya'o
T02D3450:108b-33: // de'i rjes su yi ge brgya pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod par bya'o //
T02D3450:108b-34: aom badzra sa tva sa ma ya /
T02D3450:108b-37: tishtha dri dho me bha ba /
T02D3450:108b-38: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02D3450:108b-39: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02D3450:108b-40: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02D3450:108b-45: bha ga b'a na sarba ta th'a ga ta /
T02D3450:108b-46: badzra m'a me munytsa badzr'i bha ba ma h'a sa
T02D3450:108b-47: ma ya sa tva a'a:zhes pa'i yi ge brgya pa
T02D3450:108b-48: bklags nas spro ba dang bsdu ba la sogs pa
T02D3450:109a-1: sems dpa'i nga rgyal gyis ci bder gnas par bya'o //
T02D3450:109a-2: ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas yang
T02D3450:109a-3: dag pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho'i pha rol du
T02D3450:109a-4: phyin par gyur nas dus ring por mi thogs par
T02D3450:109a-5: bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro
T02D3450:109a-6: zhes so // tshig lhug gsal po 'di yis ni //
T02D3450:109a-7: dkar po'i sgrub thabs yang dag bris //
